report.title: Location species grid filter
report.description: Limit species displayed on grid to the country selected by the user.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl_allowed_taxa_with_meanings JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl_allowed_taxa on cttl_allowed_taxa.taxon_meaning_id = cttl_allowed_taxa_with_meanings.taxon_meaning_id AND cttl_allowed_taxa.taxon_list_id in (#list_of_taxon_lists_to_check#) #joins# WHERE cttl_allowed_taxa_with_meanings.taxon_list_id in (#list_of_taxon_lists_to_check#)

param.name: sample_country_attribute_id
param.description: Attribute that holds a sample's country selection (a termlists_term ID).

param.name: sample_id
param.description: Optionally limit species grid to species associated with this sample's location.
param.join:
JOIN sample_attribute_values sav on sav.sample_id = #sample_id# AND sav.sample_attribute_id = #sample_country_attribute_id# AND sav.deleted = false -- Must take into account that a country's synonyms might have been used JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_loc1 on ctt_loc1.id = sav.int_value JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_loc_syn1 on ctt_loc_syn1.meaning_id = ctt_loc1.meaning_id
JOIN taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values ttlav1 on ttlav1.taxa_taxon_list_id = cttl_allowed_taxa.id AND ttlav1.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id = #location_taxon_attribute_id# AND ttlav1.int_value = ctt_loc1_syn.id AND ttlav1.deleted = false

param.name: location_termlist_and_species_filter
param.description: Limit species grid to species associated with this location if sample_id not present.
param.join:
-- Must take into account that a country's synonyms might have been used JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_loc2 on ctt_loc2.id = #location_termlist_and_species_filter# JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_loc_syn2 on ctt_loc_syn2.meaning_id = ctt_loc2.meaning_id
JOIN taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values ttlav2 on ttlav2.taxa_taxon_list_id = cttl_allowed_taxa.id AND ttlav2.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id = #location_taxon_attribute_id# AND ttlav2.int_value = ctt_loc_syn2.id AND ttlav2.deleted = false

param.name: location_taxon_attribute_id
param.description: Attribute that holds the locations to limit species grid to.

param.name: list_of_taxon_lists_to_check
param.description: Comma separated list of IDs of taxon lists to check the language against. Usually this will just be one ID
